== Ubuntu Florida Loco Team Projects ==

Below is a list of active and completed team projects.  Feel free to contact the individuals involved for specific details.  If you would like to request assistance or make a suggestion for a team project please email us: ubuntu-us-fl@lists.ubuntu.com.  If you are a team member initiate a new team project on this page.

When we plan events, the following should be informed/updated:

 {*} <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-fl|Mailing List]]</nowiki> - Subscribe and post with details and links

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=225|Forums]]</nowiki> - Sign up and post

 {*} <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FloridaTeam/Projects|Projects/Events Page]]</nowiki> - Register with Launchpad and update page

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fl.org/|Website]]</nowiki> - Will be added based on info from the mailing list post (above)

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/calendar/embed?src=av5048qnq6u9pp6kbehb5kgvq0%40group.calendar.google.com&ctz=America/New_York|Calendar]]</nowiki> - Will be added based on info from the mailing list post (above)

 {*} IRC Channel (#ubuntu-us-fl) topic - /msg itnet7, dantalizing, pak33m

 {*} Update the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FloridaTeam/Events | Events List ]]</nowiki>!
